keyMoments.title: Luffy's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Luffy emerges from a barrel and introduces himself to Koby, declaring his dream to become King of the Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of the series protagonist and establishment of his core dream.
keyMoments.quote: I'm gonna be King of the Pirates!

keyMoments.title: First Use of Gomu Gomu no Pistol
keyMoments.description: Luffy demonstrates his Devil Fruit powers by stretching his arm to punch Alvida.
keyMoments.significance: First display of Luffy's signature fighting ability.

abilities.description: Luffy stretches his arm back and launches a powerful punch.

relationships.description: Luffy befriends Koby and encourages him to pursue his dream of becoming a Marine.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy and Koby meet when Luffy emerges from the barrel on Alvida's ship.

reveals.information: Wants to become King of the Pirates
Ate the Gomu Gomu no Mi Devil Fruit
